title: Trump visits border amid US shutdown wall row
content: Mr Trump threatened to declare a national emergency, and insisted Mexico would pay for the wall.

title: Brexit: Japan's PM says 'wish of whole world' to avoid no-deal
content: MPs are expected to reject Mrs May's deal - but Shinzo Abe has backed it during a visit to London.

title: Kevin Fret: Gay rapper shot dead in Puerto Rico aged 24
content: The young musician was shot eight times while riding a motorbike in Puerto Rico, police say.

title: Jakiw Palij: Nazi guard deported by US dies in Germany
content: Jakiw Palij was 95 when he was sent to Germany last year, following a long deportation battle.

title: Ex-soap star charged with assault
content: The former Neighbours star was accused by his cast members of inappropriate touching and harassment.

title: The refuge for children with microcephaly
content: A school in Kenya is rescuing children with microcephaly, who are considered a curse by many local communities.

title: Manila's 'trolley boys'
content: How a homeless community in the Philippines is ferrying passengers around on 'borrowed' rails.

title: Three reasons for the US government shutdown
content: As the shutdown hits three weeks, here's why we've reached this stalemate.

title: Syria war: My son was an IS fighter, now I'm trying to save his children
content: Latifa says she travelled from her home in Morocco after her son died fighting for the Islamic State group.

title: The strange normality of life in a breakaway state
content: Things aren't always simple for the millions who live in places that aren't considered real nations.

title: African migration 'a trickle' thanks to trafficking ban across the Sahara
content: Despite a clampdown on migration through the desert many are still prepared to make the deadly journey.

title: ’Ignorant and offensive!' The subtext of subtitles
content: Director Alfonso Cuarón is furious about his latest film being subtitled. Why is it such a minefield?

title: Croatian women challenge brutal pregnancy 'care'
content: Croatia's women use #BreakTheSilence to share tales of mistreatment in pregnancy or childbirth.

title: What is Germany planning in case of a no-deal Brexit?
content: There are concerns Germany is unprepared in the eventuality of a no-deal Brexit.

title: The men who stay awake so Indians can sleep
content: Private security guards in India have become de-facto protectors across urban neighbourhoods.

title: The drone pilot whose maps are saving lives in Zanzibar
content: Drones are being used to map previously unmapped areas in Africa to the benefit of its citizens.
